title: Apple has revealed a Passwords app vulnerability that lasted for months

title: The name doesn’t matter (that much)

title: I've visited celebrity-loved ski towns in Italy and Colorado. Here's where to go if you want to feel like an A-lister without breaking the bank.
description: Aspen, Colorado, and Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy, attract celebrities and wealthy travelers. I've visited both and prefer the more affordable ski town.

title: I spent 3 nights in a secluded lodge in Italy's Dolomites. The views were unreal, but they weren't even the best part.
description: Forestis Dolomites, a five-star hotel in Italy, offers striking mountain views and a spa with five saunas, two infinity pools, and a cold plunge.

title: Amazon has chopped 35% OFF the Beats Solo 4 wireless headphones for a limited time
description: Multiple retailers are offering 35% discounts on the Beats Solo 4s, offering a solid deal on a great pair of on-ear headphones.

title: Space science is under threat from the anti-DEI purge
